mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs Greenberg Reed
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs Greenberg Reed Offense: Assault and battery Victim: Amon Reed Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 05.26.1887 Costs: $.50 Promised by James P. Hall and C.L. Duncan if Greenberg Reed failed to keep the peace as required
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
Warrants (Law)
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
